scripts.install: concurrently "cd webapp && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
scripts.dev: npm run install && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd webapp && npm run dev"
scripts.clear-db: cd backend && rm -f data.sqlite && node db-seeder.js
scripts.reset-dev: concurrently "npm run clear-db && npm run dev" "sleep 5 && open http://localhost:4618"
